Rates of chronic disease in Community Board 9

While 29 percent of West Harlem adults report having hypertension, 2 of 536 CUIMC trials relate to the condition.

Of the 228 cancer trials, 104 are related to the three most common cancers among Community Board 9 residents: lung, colorectal, and pancreatic cancers.
